text: MŠK Iskra Petržalka is a Slovak football team, based in the town of Petržalka, near Bratislava. The club was founded in 1934. ==Notable players== The following players had international caps for their respective countries. Players whose name is listed in bold represented their countries while playing for Slovan. :Past (and present) players who are the subjects of Wikipedia articles can be found here. * Alias Lembakoali == External links == *Official website ==References== Iskra Petrzalka Category:Football clubs in Bratislava Category:Association football clubs established in 1934 Category:1934 establishments in Slovakia
title: MŠK Iskra Petržalka
